release_notes:
• Major improvements: auto-save, accurate gain/loss, new withdrawal calc
• Fix persistence and prediction issues
• Bump version to 2.15.0+33
• Fix data wipe on app start and investment account double-counting
• Add data management screen to clean up orphaned data
• Fix net worth chart, add portfolio return line to projection
• Fix stock doubling, add real estate rental tracking, improve withdrawal calculator
• Fix build: remove remaining snapshot method references
• Fix portfolio calculations to use transaction history only
• Add holdings sort, toggle return type, remove profile stats
